Candidate Name:  Utkarsh Bais  
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS  
  
Location:    Melbourne , Australia  (Australian Citiz en) 
 
QUALIFICATIONS  
 
Master of I nformation Technology , IT Security and Business Analytics  – Deakin University  (2014 – 2015 ) - Focus 
on Cyber Security, Digital Forensics, Threat intelligence, Vulnerability Management, Incident Response and 
Remediation, Security Management.  
 
B.Tech. , Information T echnology  – Amity University Delhi  (2008 – 2012 ) 
 
Professiona l: 
Certi fied Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)  
Certified Industrial Cyber Security Specialist (CICSS)  
Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)  
Red Hat Certified engineer (RHCE)  
Six Sigma (Green Belt)  
OSCP (exam scheduled)  
 
 
CAREER SUMMARY  
 
2019 to date: SIS ( Security Infrastructure Solutions ) – Melbou rne, Australia  
Position: ICS Se curity C onsultant  
• Work with large clients to build new service offerings, research security technologies, and deliver projects to 
meet time frames and budgets  
• Conduct review and assessment of industrial networks and critical infrastructure environments, including 
assessmen ts and testing for clients in Oil & Gas, Utilities, and Transport sectors  
• Plan, design and implement Cyber Security Architecture solutions using industry frameworks for Enterprise 
Architecture including implementation of security controls (NIST/IEC62443)  
• Develop security product requirement criteria, research, and assist with integration of approved products within 
existing environment  
• Design Cyber Security topologies to provide visualisation of implementation and integration methods.  
• Develop and impleme nt information security policies and procedures, along with experience in the effective 
execution of risk and control assurance activities including threat/risk identification, control assessments, 
controls testing, and exemption reporting  
• Conduct securit y assessments and control system tests for providing assurance on safeguarding capital -
intensive infrastructure for industries such as oil & gas, energy, water, and transport  
• Perform vulnerability assessment and penetration testing of critical infrastruct ure including  red-team 
assessment, passive and active systems and network review, security management  
• Extensive experience in security tools, technologies and best practices in cyber security testing and ethical 
hacking, holding industry recognised cert ifications  
• Lead and deliver trainings in the Cybersecurity domain  
• Sound knowledge and experience with information security frameworks, including ISO27001, ISA/IEC 62443, 
COBIT, SABSA, ITIL, OSSTMM, OWASP, and NIST  
 • Security tools experience and proficiency includes Tenable Nessus  (IT/OT ), Nozom o (Passi ve OT Analysis), 
SIEM (Assuria & Splunk), Firewall management, Rapid7 Nexpose, Metasploit, NMAP, BURP, Nikto, VEGA 
scanner, Nipper  
 
Key Proj ects:  
 
• Worked with a two of the largest transport operat ors in Australia to deliver OT Security Architecture  
• Worked with Oil and gas production organisation to deliver Vulnerability and Risk Assessment along with report 
on compliance towards government regulations  
• Worked with Energy generation, distribut ion, and retail organisation to deliver OT Security Architecture  
• Assisted with design and implementation of Security Operations Centre (SOC) and Vulnerability Management 
services  
 
2017 – 2019 nbn Australia – Melbourne,  Australia  
Position: Network Security Operations A nalyst  
• Experience in troubleshooting and maintaining infrastructure incorporatin g network and related security 
elements  
• Undertake risk analysis, vulnerability testing and security review to ensure integrity of cyber controls  
• Configure, test, and maintain firewall implementation  
• Monitor alarms and events and perform regular vulnerab ility scans  
• Assist with upgrades and modifications to the network  
• Assist with inputs to Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) for use within the environment  
• Validate the infrastructure build and Security tools implementation  
• Experience with the following technologies:  
- Microsoft AD  
- VMware, VEEAM bac

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
